title.rendered: Medusa Equip Appoints India Distributor – Nimay Engineering Services Pvt Ltd

content.rendered:
Medusa Equip are pleased to announce the appointment of Nimay Engineering Pvt Ltd as its distributor in India.

As part of the long-established specialist hydraulics and bolting company ABS Group, Nimay Engineering provides engineering services and support across the region with offices in Jamnagar (Reliance refinery), Delhi, Chennai, Kolkata and Bangalore with further sales support in Raipur.

Led by the ABS Groups founder and owner Mr Balasubramanian, Medusa Equips sales and support activities will be managed directly by their Technical Manager Mr Girish Chaudhari a specialist in hydraulics design and consultation.

They can be contacted directly by email at and to directly by phone
